ext_desc.message: This extension is supposed to drastically reduce the stuttering when trying to view someone's big library or wishlist on Steam.

options_library_performance_improvement.description: Label on the panel in options

options_wishlist_performance_improvement.description: Label on the panel in options

options_options_language.description: Label of the 'Options Language' dropdown in options

options_main_language.description: Label of the 'Main Language' dropdown in options

options_enabled.description: Label of the 'Enabled' checkbox in options

options_rows_per_page.description: Label of the 'Rows per page' dropdown in options

library_filter_by.description: Label of the list of filters

wishlist_sort_rank.description: Label of sorting by rank option

wishlist_sort_name.description: Label of sorting by name option

wishlist_sort_price.description: Label of sorting by price option

wishlist_sort_discount_p.description: Label of sorting by discount percentage option

wishlist_sort_discount_a.description: Label of sorting by discount amount option

wishlist_filter_discount.description: Label of 'Games with discount' filter option

wishlist_filter.description: Label before the textfield that filters games by their name

wishlist_save.description: Label on button that lets to save rank changes

wishlist_loading.description: Message displayed in the spinning circle while wishlist is loading

wishlist_header_total.description: Header in the block containing total wishlist information

wishlist_includes_total.description: Wishlist total block, label before the list of wishlisted items
